statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 0 \\ -3 \\ 1 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 2 \\ -3 \\ -2 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -2 \\ 15 \\ -2 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ -2 \\ -9 \\ 6 \\ 12 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ -8 \\ 36 \\ 0 \\ 0 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
